attributes.action: Adjust weighting of EU referendum votes by age for a recount.
attributes.background: Younger voters will feel the consequences of this referendum for the longest and as a result their voices should carry proportionally more weight, for a fairer vote. And so the votes should be recalculated to reflect this.

rejection.details: It's not clear how this could be done. Voting in the UK is anonymous. It is not therefore possible to work out which votes would be accorded greater weight.
